borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: This retrospective application only applies to the the rear canopy and rear outbuilding.&nbsp;<br>

<p>The development shall remain in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>Location Plan (reference PP-12337199v1, dated 24/07/2023)</li><li>Existing Plan and Elevation (drawing number MD07902 Rev 0)</li><li>Outbuilding Existing Plan and Elevations (drawing number MD07903 Rev 0)</li><li>Existing Side View and Block Plan (drawing number MD07905 Rev 1)</li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
description: Retrospective application for the retention of a rear outbuilding and rear canopy extension.
